meta.title: Verify Your Account
meta.description: Verify ownership of your streaming profile to claim your account or manage your content.

header.title: Verify Ownership
header.subtitle: Prove you own this account to claim your profile or manage your content

enterUrl.label: Your Profile
enterUrl.intro: Enter the URL of your streaming profile.

error.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

verify.label: Verify
verify.intro: To prove you own this account, add the verification code below to your profile bio. You can remove it after verification.
verify.instructions: Copy this code and add it anywhere in your profile bio. It can be at the beginning, end, or middle - we'll find it.
verify.verifyButton: I've Added the Code - Verify Now

failed.title: Couldn't find the code
failed.message: We couldn't find the verification code in your bio. Make sure you've saved your profile after adding the code. If you're having trouble, you can request manual verification.

manual.title: Manual Verification
manual.description: Our team will manually verify your account within 24-48 hours. Please provide any additional information that can help us verify you own this account (e.g., screenshot of your profile settings, email associated with the account).

input.label: Additional Information
input.placeholder: Any additional details that can help verify your ownership...

pending.title: Verification Pending
pending.message: We've received your verification request. Our team will review it and get back to you within 24-48 hours via email.

created.title: Welcome!
created.message: Your account has been created and your profile is now linked.

linked.title: Profile Linked
linked.message: Your profile has been linked to your account. Please login to access your dashboard.

deleted.title: Recordings Deleted
deleted.message: {count, plural, =0 {No recordings found.} =1 {1 recording has been deleted.} other {# recordings have been deleted.}}

notFound.title: Profile Not Found
notFound.message: Your ownership was verified, but this content creator doesn't exist in our system.
